FilterItemPortable.Name: Cadastro
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="DATAINCLUSAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>maior ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="DATAINCLUSAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>menor ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator><=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Cidade
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="PAIS"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="ESTADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="MUNICIPIO"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="4"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.FASE <> 6 AND A.SUBFASE NOT IN (2,11,12,28)</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Where>1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND A.FASE <> 6 AND A.SUBFASE NOT IN (2,11,12,28)</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
